summary.para: Allows a tab to specify whether the main application frame window or the tab window should be used as a thumbnail or in the peek feature under certain circumstances.

param.name: hwndTab
param.para: The handle of the tab window that is to have properties set. This handle must already be registered through .

param.name: stpFlags
param.para: One or more members of the enumeration that specify the displayed thumbnail and peek image source of the tab thumbnail.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: An application might want to use the thumbnail or peek representation of its associated parent window if the application cannot generate its own thumbnail for a tab or for its active tab content (such as an animation) to appear live.

summary.para: Extends by providing a method that allows the caller to control two property values for the tab thumbnail and peek feature.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the , , and interfaces, from which it inherits.
An implementation of this interface is provided in Windows as CLSID_TaskbarList. This interface is not implemented by third parties.

Use the methods of this interface for the following:

item.description: To use the thumbnail image of the application frame window in place of the tab thumbnail in some circumstances.
To use the application frame window in place of the tab as the source of the tab's peek image (a full-screen view of the window in response to a mouse-over event in the thumbnail).
